programme.title: WSL Bonsoy Gold Coast Pro wrap show
programme.desc: The WSL team dissect the top stories, triumphs and upsets of the 2025 Bonsoy Gold Coast Pro.

programme.title: The sensei part 1
programme.desc: Legendary climber Yuji Hirayama enlists a young partner to help him with a swan-song summit.

programme.desc: Daniel Woods has proven himself. Now he and his sensei, Yuji Hirayama, head to untapped peaks in Borneo.

programme.title: Barefoot Charles
programme.desc: Barefoot Charles Albert is a minimalist who climbs boulders in Fontainebleau, France, and lives in a cave.

programme.title: Black Pearl
programme.desc: At 42, Chris Sharma conquers Black Pearl in Mallorca – his toughest deep water solo climb yet.

programme.title: Greece
programme.desc: Sasha DiGiulian creates new routes in a Grecian area not typically travelled to by the climbing community.
